snippet.title: Saturday morning cartoon Floops indie game roguelite new cinematic trailer!
snippet.description:
Monsters are invading! Floop is in trouble! Who will help save his house from all these monsters??

Floops Big House Adventure is a fast paced Saturday morning roguelite shooter. 

Wishlist on Steam today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2783290/Floops_Big_House_Adventure/

Floops is a 90's inspired cartoon arcade style roguelite. Defeat waves of enemies and giant disgusting bosses in order to save Floops house!

Developed and published by Buttery Games: https://butterygames.com

Hang out with us on discord: discord.gg/KWwbHD2

Wishlist on Steam today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2783290/Floops_Big_House_Adventure/
